loginPrompt: Log in to Ping Pong and play with many people.
signUp: Don't have an account? Sign up
userNotFound: User not found Please Try Again!
erroroccured: An Error Occured Please Try Again
firstNameLength: First name must be at least 6 characters long
lastNameLength: Last name must be at least 6 characters long
passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
invalidEmail: Please provide a valid email address
getLinksPrompt: To receive the necessary links, please enter your email address.
ErrorEmailReset: The user with this email address was not found or an error occurred.
joinus: Enter your credentials to join us
alreadyhavaccout: Already have an account ? Sign In
alreadyexist: The user already exists or an error has occurred.
useappauth: Use an authentication app or browser extension to get codes
paragraphchnagepassword: Make sure your new password is strong by including a mix of letters, numbers, and special characters. Save your changes, and your new password will be set. If you encounter any issues, contact customer support for assistance.
paragraphAuth: Scan the QR code using any authentication app on your Phone, (Recommended, Google Authenticator, Authy, Authenticator) or just enter the following secret
localdetails: Compete against a friend on the same computer using a shared keyboard.
remotedetails: Battle with friends over a network, playing from separate machines or Mac OS systems.
tourdescription: Create a tournament with multiple players
tourdetails: Set up and organize a tournament for several players, complete with brackets and match scheduling.
multidetails: Play with up to four players, each competing against one another. Configuration details can be managed via a JSON file with specific keys.
choose: Choose from different game modes to play!
paragraphwiting: Please wait while we find another player to join the game.
session_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
dontexists: User Or Page your looking for Does not Exist
pagenotexist: This page you looking for it is not exist
entersixdigit: Enter the 6 digit that you get from authenticator
blockedByUser: You have been blocked by this user
selectUser: Select a user to start a conversation
playerjoinmulti: Please wait while we find other player to join the game.
tourwait: Your next tournament opponent is waiting!
welcome-subtitle: The ultimate online ping pong game. Play against friends, join tournaments, and rise to the top!
jtc: Join tournaments and compete against the best players around the globe.
challenge: Challenge your friends to a friendly match or play against random opponents.
climb: Climb the leaderboards and show the world your ping pong skills.
againstf: Play against friends or random opponents in real-time.
knowyour: Know your opponent better with our real-time chat feature.
roommode: Play against your friends in the same room with our local modes.
rights: 2024 Ping Pong Pro. All rights reserved.
badrequest: Bad request. Please check your input and try again.
sendrequestorusernotfound: Failed to send friend request. User not found.
servererror: Server Error, Please try again later
unexpectederror: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
networkerror: Network error occurred. Please check your internet connection and try again.
erroroccurred: An error occurred. Please try again later.
Authorizationtokenmissing: Authorization token missing. Please log in.
Invalidtoken: Invalid token. Please log in again.
failedToGetMessages: Failed to get messages. Please try again later.
sure: Are you sure you want to delete it?
paragraph: Deleting your account is a permanent action and cannot be undone. All your data, including personal information, settings, and history, will be permanently removed. If you're sure you want to proceed, please confirm by clicking the "Delete" button below.
cant: Can't create/join a game at this time.
alreadyin: You're already in a game or waiting for a game!

__error_settings_password.password_car: Passwords must be at least 8 characters long.
__error_settings_password.error_old_password: The new password is the same as the current password.

__error_settings_password.n__passwordcar: New password must be between 8 and 100 characters

error__otp.__otp_invalid: OTP is invalid or already used

passwordValidation.length: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
passwordValidation.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
passwordValidation.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
passwordValidation.number: Password must contain at least one number.
passwordValidation.specialCharacter: Password must contain at least one special character (!@#$%^&*).
